alert.note: Alert for Bacon; Brantley; Northern Ware; Pierce; Southern Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 07 at 10:48PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Pierce, west central Brantley, northeastern Ware and southwestern Bacon Counties through 1130 PM EDT... At 1048 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Alma to Waycross to 11 miles southeast of Manor. Movement was northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Waycross, Alma, Blackshear, Boggy Bay, Jamestown, Pebble Hill, Dixie Union, Needham and Bickley. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Bacon; Brantley; Northern Ware; Pierce; Southern Ware
